page.title: 05SOCIAL LIFE IN BARTON
page.content: Barton is lacking in many social facilities for young children _ it has no cinema for example.There are youth clubs and various sporting facilities but Barton cannot compare with Hull or Scunthorpe in the range of night life. In a{survey}of about sixty 12_13 year olds about their leisure activities the following information was gathered. In the world of pop music the most popular groups were:- Shakin Stevens, Madonna,Wham and Nik Kershaw. {Television}was the main leisure activity and the most popular programmes were _ The Young Ones, Dynasty,Dallas and Top of The Pops.The most popular hobbies were swimming, fishing and watching videos.
